donations.heading: Ramesh Needs a Wheelchair!
donations.description: I am Disable up to 45%. I am 38 years old Male. I am Living at Kurla West Mumbai. My Family is very poor. I need support for small stall/treatment and financial support to run my life smoothly. I need help about wheel chair to live with self-esteem. not comfortable for walking. My family is not in a position to bear my expenses. my right Leg was not proper working I need to Wheelchair and job, So Please support me.
